titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Eastvale, California.
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Eastvale, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing only Eastvale, California.
